songs.title: Meaning of life Remmmmix
songs.lyrics:
[Xzibit]
I touch my dick in public
Im Xzibit and men is my game
Yo nigga 's gay and in the hall of fame
With over 50 men and I always came
Bein' with a woman thats just straight lame
Suck my small dick
Suck my ass
Suck my balls and small dick
When I'm with a man it always ends quick
Yo men can I give your ass a lick
I always tell my friends "Yo, wanna meet Rick!"
Dick the size of uranus
You wanna see it fit?
Ass like a giant pit
To spit is to quit
And I'm a winner
On top of this game like I'm on top of men
Sucking dick, thats in my top ten
Number one is fondling testicles
Eight dicks on me at a time like tentacles
Can fit them all in my ass, I'm quite flexible
With all these men on me like a gay festival
These dicks in my face like testicle spectacles
I won't bite im very sensual
In that ass like a professional
I like women?
Nigga I ain't heterosexual

[Hook]

YO NIGGA THATS THE MEANING OF LIFE
SUCKING DICK AND TOUCHING SOME TESTICAL

[Hook x3]
